data.title: Mastercard to acquire Utah-based fintech firm Finicity for £659 million
data.text: In a statement on Tuesday, Mastercard Inc. (NYSE: MA) announced plans of acquiring Finicity for £659 million.

data.title: Mastercard stock gets rare downgrade at Oppenheimer
data.text: Mastercard Inc. shares MA, +0.67% were subject to a rare downgrade late Monday as Oppenheimer's Dominick Gabriele cut his rating on the card network to perform from outperform.

data.title: Mastercard Acquires Finicity For $825M
data.text: Mastercard Inc (NYSE: MA) announced on Tuesday it has entered into an agreement to acquire Finicity for $825 million.

data.title: Mastercard to purchase open-banking company Finicity for $825 million
data.text: Mastercard Inc. MA, +2.67% announced Tuesday that it plans to acquire open-banking company Finicity for $825 million.
